name: Mad Gun Range VR Simulator
description: Welcome to Mad Gun Range VR Simulator! Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of this modern world! Now you do not need to go to the landfill to shoot. Thanks to the incredibly realistic graphics, you are guaranteed a complete immersion!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 (AMD Ryzen 7 1800X) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 (Radeon RX 580) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2500 MB available space
